verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Pokea ee Baba
vipaji vyetu hivi,
vitakase Bwana uvibariki. x2

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Fedha tunatoa mikononi
mwako,
zitakase Bwana uzibariki.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Mazao ya shamba
twayaleta kwako,
yatakase Bwana uyabariki.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Mkate divai tunaleta kwako,
vitakase Bwana uvibariki,

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Na sisi wenyewe twajitoa kwako,
tutakase Bwana utubariki.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Atukuzwe Baba na Mwana na roho,
mwanzo hata sasa milele yote.
